questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Networking Fundamentals (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: TCP Three-Way Handshake is a key concept in Networking Fundamentals. This domain covers topics essential for the GIAC GSEC exam.

Document the findings in a report
